Title: Relates to the New York state infrastructure trust fund, establishes a blue ribbon commission to study the minority and women-owned business enterprise program, and establishes a mentor-protege training program
Summary: Relates to the New York state infrastructure trust fund, in relation to the minority and women-owned business enterprise program; establishes a blue ribbon commission to study such program, and establishes a mentor-protege training program; appropriates money therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 261 of the laws of 1988, amending the state finance law and other laws relating to the New York state infrastructure trust fund, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; establishing a blue ribbon commission to study the minority and women-owned business enterprise program, and establishing a mentor-protege training program; and making an appropriation therefor; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
